commit message: Change short app name to 'Tinfoil' to avoid concerns with Facebook
Remove bottom action bar
Reorganize menu action items
Show action bar and hide the icon and title from it
Show action bar while a site is loading, hide it when it's done
Do not finish the activity in order to let it resume. Just destroy the webview
Use largeHeap in phones that have enough RAM
Hide action bar and show it again when flinging/scrolling up
Use the proper 'setButton' method for the AlertDialog. Other method was deprecated
Clean up a bit by using the Constants as an interface
Use the proper 'setButton' method for the AlertDialog. Other method was deprecated
Clean up a bit by using the Constants as an interface
Make the ability to hide action bar optional and disabled by default
Show home icon and title (short) again
Only mess with ActionBar stuff is device is on honeycomb or higher
Change text for exit button to 'kill'
Move around the order of the context menu
Do not destroy with a timer in order to keep the ability to multi-task. Only destroy if the 'Kill' button is used.
To risky, might break in the future
Ability to auto-hide Action bar is experimental
Show the action bar only when flinging down
Only make action bar re-appear if the user flings down quick
Do not use hardware acceleration for webview, it's causing some problems
Update to version 1.1.2
Use new 'BuildConfig.DEBUG' in latest SDK/ADT in order to force logging whenever we are running in debug mode
Re-order context menu again
Add some more logging (optional)
Use action home button for HC/ICS on preferences activity to go back to webview
